articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Blasts Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket of U.S. and Its Allies
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Blasts Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket of U.S. and Its Allies
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on Friday in connection with the fact that the anti-DPRK human rights racket of the U.S. and its allied forces has reached an extremely reckless phase:
					 These days the U.S. is hurling its allied forces into kicking up a reckless anti-DPRK human rights racket, holding an informal meeting on the "human rights" issue in the DPRK and holding an open dialogue at the UN Security Council.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. instigated the European Parliament to adopt a "resolution" supporting the recommendation made by the "Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights situations in the DPRK.
					
					 Such frantic racket is aimed at tarnishing the image of the dignified DPRK at any cost and bringing down the ideology and social system chosen by the Korean people in the long run.
					
					 Prompted by this aim the U.S. is working hard to discuss the "human rights" issue of the DPRK as an official agenda item at the UN Security Council quite contrary to the mandate stipulated in the UN Charter. Finding it difficult to do so, it is talking such nonsense that it is advisable to discuss it by adding the agenda item on the nuclear issue and there is also a way of discussing it at the UN General Assembly.
					
					 The European Parliament perpetrated such imprudent and base hostile action against the DPRK as adopting what it called "resolution", pursuant to the U.S. anti-DPRK hostile policy.
					
					 Great irony was that they let such riff-ruffs as so-called "defectors to the south" appear at UN Security Council and European Parliament in a bid to stir up an atmosphere of accusing the DPRK.
					
					 As far as those riff-ruffs the U.S. considered as "witnesses" are concerned, they are the criminals who fled after committing thrice cursed crimes against the country and its people. They are terrorists who stood up against the social system in the DPRK where the popular masses are leading a happy life as masters of the state and society.
					
					 When time comes, their despicable true colors will be fully laid bare.
					
					 Then the U.S. and the West will not be able to escape shame and disgrace they will suffer for bringing those terrorists to the sacred human rights arena. At the same time they will not be able to evade the blame for having hatched a plot to slander and bring down a sovereign state together with them.
					
					 The U.S. and the West had better put under control the worst human rights abuses in their own countries and mind their own business.
					
					 The more vociferous the U.S. and its allied forces become in their human rights racket intended to hurt the prestige of our dignified Republic and its social system, the stronger our single-minded unity will grow and the faster the speed of our advance towards the final victory will become.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Thanks from Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Thanks from Chongryon
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a message of thanks from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Friday.
					 The message said the educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 207.8 million yen sent by the Marshal instill great strength and courage into all the Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan and powerfully encourage them to the patriotic movement.
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of Chongryon extends the highest glory and thanks to the Marshal for showing constant loving care for the development of the democratic national education of children of Koreans in Japan, the message noted, and continued:
					
					 We will enshrine the firm faith that we will surely win as there is you however hard the situation may be, uphold you as the unitary center of unity and leadership and further cement Chongryon as the overseas Koreans' organization of you.
					
					 We will hold fast to national education as a lifeline of the movement of Koreans in Japan, thoroughly establish Juche in education, steadily improve the contents and form of national education and bring up the rising generation to be genuine patriots intensely loyal to you and competent talents of the nation who will carry forward the cause of patriotism.
					
					 We will resolutely oppose and reject the Japanese authorities' unprecedented moves to suppress the national education and powerfully arouse the whole organization and Koreans in Japan to the struggle for defending the national education which the preceding patriotic generations have defended at the cost of their lives.

articles.title: Greetings to Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zimbabwean President
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the president and people of Zimbabwe greater success in their work to defend the stability of the country and achieve the national unity and economic development.

articles.title: Reception Given by Iranian Military Attache
articles.content:
Reception Given by Iranian Military Attache
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Military Attache of the Iranian embassy here Hassan Reza Husseini gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the occasion of the Day of the Iranian Army.
					 Present there on invitation were Colonel General of the Korean People's Army O Kum Chol, KPA generals and officers, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Present there were Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Mansour Chavoshi and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Anniversary of Instructions Given by Kim Jong Il to Schools to Specialize in Particular Sports Events Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Instructions Given by Kim Jong Il to Schools  to Specialize in Particular Sports Events Observed
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Central Youth Hall on Friday to mark the 40th anniversary of instructions given by leader Kim Jong Il to schools to specialize in particular sports events.
					 On April 18, Juche 63 (1974) he said it is good for schools to specialize in particular sports events like Taejong Senor Middle School (at that time) in Singye County, North Hwanghae Province in order to popularize physical culture and sports at schools. This would help train many reserve sports persons and rapidly develop the country's sports technique, he added.
					
					 His instructions serve as important guidelines for further developing physical culture and sports at schools, popularizing sports and bringing about an epochal turn in the work for training promising reserve sportspersons and developing the Juche-based sports technique.
					
					 Over the past four decades many sportspersons trained at school groups specializing in particular sports events have emerged as world and Asian title holders, heroes, people's sportspersons and merited sportspersons. 
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, said in his report that Kim Jong Il's idea on stepping up the activities of the school groups specializing in particular sports events is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called upon all school sports teachers, members of the groups specializing in particular sports events and officials of the youth league to more dynamically wage the drive to carry out the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for building a sports power.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned and officials of the youth league and others.

articles.title: Venue of Kimilsungia Festival Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Venue of Kimilsungia Festival Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people are visiting the venue of the 16th Kimilsungia Festival every day. It is now under way on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the venue of the festival decorated with tens of thousands of potted Kimilsungias the visitors remembered Kim Il Sung as sun of mankind.
					
					 The festival reflected the faith and will of all the service personnel and people and warm reverence of the world progressive people to hold in high esteem and follow the President as father of the nation, peerless patriot and sun of Juche for all ages.
					
					 Going round the venue of the festival, service personnel, working people and school youth and children are cherishing deeper in their minds the boundless pride and self-esteem of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 The potted Kimilsungias sent by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and overseas Koreans represented the firm resolution of all the compatriots to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as founder of socialist Korea and father of the nation.
					
					 The visitors were deeply moved to see Kimilsungias displayed by diplomatic missions and missions of international organizations here, foreign friendship organizations and foreigners.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea left here Friday. They included the delegation of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, delegation of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works, delegation of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, delegation of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun, chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as deputy director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), secretary general of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea and the director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 Leaving earlier were the delegation of the February 16 Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics of Belarus, delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the department director of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan who doubles as director of the IIJI.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Delegations Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Delegations Leave
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Delegations of overseas Koreans left here on Friday. They included the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo and the delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans headed by First Vice-Chairman Kim Chil Song.
					 Leaving earlier was the delegation of the Korean Businessmen's Association in Dandong, China led by Chairman Kim Thaek Ryong.

articles.title: Australia-resident Korean Singer Acclaimed at April Art Festival
articles.content:
Australia-resident Korean Singer Acclaimed at April Art Festival
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Mi So, 28, an Australia-resident Korean singer, is one of overseas Korean singers who enjoyed popularity among audience at the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival held in the DPRK. 
					 With her rich voice and passionate tone, she successfully sang songs "Ode to the Motherland" and "Ardent Desire" to be encored at every performance given at the Concert Hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory.
					
					 She has been well-known among the people of the DPRK since the 23rd April Spring Friendship Art Festival held in 2005 for her perfect singing of song "It Is Only Our General".
					
					 After the performance given on April 14, Kim told KCNA:
					
					 Though I live in Australia, I've never considered my destiny to be apart from my homeland. Therefore I chose the song "Ode to the Motherland" as a compatriot.
					
					 The lyrics and melody of the song make all overseas Koreans yearn for the homeland with ardent love for it.
					
					 After my arrival in Pyongyang, I learnt the song "Ardent Desire", because I came to keenly realize how devotedly the people in the homeland are yearning for and following the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who are making a long journey of patriotic devotion for the country.
					
					 As an overseas Korean, I tried to fully depict their unanimous desire. But the audience gave me hearty cheers to me, encoring my songs.
					
					 My successful performance would have been unthinkable without their enthusiastic cheers.
					
					 Han Sung Su, her maternal grandfather and advisor to the Federation of Koreans in Australia, said:
					
					 I am much impressed by seeing the people of the homeland encoring my granddaughter with bouquets. Their joy makes me have high national pride and be fully determined to do my best for the prosperity of the homeland.

articles.title: Vietnamese Art Troupe Proves Successful at Art Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
Vietnamese Art Troupe Proves Successful at Art Festival in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Among the foreign art troupes participated in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival held here was the art troupe of the National Song and Dance Theatre of Vietnam. The art troupe gave its performances, which began with an instrumental ensemble "The Sun of the East", at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre as part of the festival.
					 The instrumental ensemble reflected the boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and Ho Chi Minh who had performed undying feats in developing the friendly relations between the DPRK and Vietnam.
					
					 The art troupe also put on the stage several Korean songs like "Attraction and Reverence", "Ardent Desire" and "Glory to Our Great Party" to be acclaimed by audience.
					
					 Especially, a male trio "Song of Loyalty" made the audience recall with deep emotion the whole life of Kim Il Sung who had devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people through ceaseless field guidance.
					
					 Do Truong Anh, a musical director of the troupe, told KCNA that the troupe prepared famous Korean songs for the festival, adding all the artistes of the troupe love Korean songs.
					
					 The troupe also attended the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Archery Finals Held
articles.content:
Archery Finals Held
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games are taking place before full houses.
					 The archery finals were held at the Sosan Football Stadium on Friday.
					
					 The finals brought together players of the B group of the Defence Sports Team of the Korean People's Army, Amnokgang Defence Sports Team, Suyangsan Sports Team and Songaksan Sports Team. They were divided into the men's and women's team and individual events and mixed team events.
					
					 Players of the B group of the Defence Sports Team of the Korean People's Army placed first at the men's and women's team events.
					
					 The Amnokgang Defence Sports Team and Suyangsan Sports Team placed second and third.
					
					 The Songaksan Sports Team came first at the mixed team events, the Amnokgang Defence Sports Team second and the B group of the Defence Sports Team of the Korean People's Army third.
					
					 Kim Pong Hun, player of the B group of the Defence Sports Team of the Korean People's Army, took the first place at the men's individual events, Jang Kum Chol, player of the Suyangsan Sports Team, the second place and Ri Hyo Song, player of the B group of the Defence Sports Team of the Korean People's Army, the third place.
					
					 Ri Un Ok, player of the B group of the Defence Sports Team of the Korean People's Army, took the first place at the women's individual events, Kim Hye Gyong, player of the Songaksan Sports Team, the second place and Mun Sol Gyong, player of the B group of the Defence Sports Team of the Korean People's Army, the third place.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests went round historic relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the time-honored low roofed house.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the Chinese Art Troupes (the Eastern Song and Dance Ensemble and the Shandong Provincial Circus) said:
					
					 My long-cherished desire to visit Mangyongdae came true today. Our visit to Mangyongdae offered an opportunity to know better about the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung who was born in a simple family.
					
					 Viktor Yeliseev, head of the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, noted:
					
					 An endless stream of people is visiting the old home in Mangyongdae dear to the Korean people. Witnessing this fact alone, we can know well the great Comrade Kim Il Sung was the genuine popular leader.
					
					 Kivikangas Matti Juhani, head of a brass band of Finland, said that he was pleased to visit Mangyongdae where the President was born.
					
					 The participants also visited the National Gifts Exhibition House, Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Rungna Dolphinarium, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Quadrennial Defense Review Report
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Quadrennial Defense Review Report
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Defense Department recently made public the Quadrennial Defense Review Report with an aim to steadily bolster up its three strategic nuclear strike means.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. now seems to have forgotten the phraseology "building of a world without nuclear weapons" which it touted so much as it is now openly crying out for bolstering up its nuclear strike means.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said phraseology is no more than a political advertisement to deceive other countries and mislead mind-set of the world people. Prompted by its scenario to calm down the strong anti-U.S. sentiment and disarm the nuclear weapons states, Washington came out with the phraseology "building of a world without nuclear weapons" in a bid to create impression that it is greatly interested in peace.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which threatens other countries with nukes and refuses to sincerely fulfill its nuclear non-proliferation commitment.
					
					 U.S. nuclear carriers, nuclear submarines and strategic bombers, the three strategic nuclear strike means, are frequenting various parts of the Pacific and Atlantic oceans, threatening peace and security. The intercontinental ballistic missiles, another strategic nuclear strike means, target against their rivals' strategic strongholds on a permanent basis.
					
					 Israel had access to more than 200 nukes, a product of the U.S. moves to proliferate the nuclear weapons technology overtly and covertly.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear strike means made the DPRK the primary target of their attack.
					
					 Facts will prove the validity of the DPRK's self-defensive nuclear deterrence aimed at warding off a world-wide nuclear disaster and realizing the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.

articles.title: U.S. Noisy Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Censured
articles.content:
U.S. Noisy Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Censured
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. smear campaign against the DPRK has reached an intolerable phase these days, says Rodong Sinmun on Friday in an article. It goes on:
					 The U.S., not content with vociferating about "threats" from the DPRK, labeled it a "country of evils" and "evil place." It is letting loose a string of invectives against the DPRK, taking issue with it over its election of deputies to the power body. It is going reckless to bring up the "human rights issue" of the DPRK for discussion at the UN Security Council in a bid to internationalize it.
					
					 The U.S. is getting busy with the anti-DPRK smear campaign as it is much upset by the socialist system of Korean style fully displaying its advantages and might. 
					
					 Such advantages and might of socialism which capitalism can neither imitate nor display are throwing the U.S. imperialists into despair. 
					
					 The U.S. desperate smear campaign against the DPRK is aimed to save at any cost the system of international cooperation in it now shaking to its very foundation.
					
					 Mankind is finding out its way in the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Peace on the Korean peninsula is guaranteed by the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK's ongoing struggle to defend socialism is the one to prevail over imperialism in all aspects of social life by giving fullest play to the advantages and might of socialism while consolidating the victories and achievements already gained.
					
					 The base and vicious anti-DPRK smear campaign would get the U.S. imperialists nowhere.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Oppose Arms Buildup
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Oppose Arms Buildup
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Members of 28 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and lawmakers held a press conference before the building of the "National Assembly" in Seoul on April 14, at which they denounced the puppet authorities for their arms buildup, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 The speakers condemned the south Korean authorities for spending a stupendous amount of funds for military purposes last year.
					
					 The arms buildup only poses a threat to the peace on the Korean peninsula, they held.

articles.title: Resignation of IS Director of S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Resignation of IS Director of S. Korea Demanded
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches urged the director of the puppet Intelligence Service to resign, according to the south Korean CBS on April 16.
					 The organization recalled that Director of the IS Nam Jae Jun made public a "written apology before the people" in connection with the spy case faked up by the IS.
					
					 Nam is not entitled to make an apology before the people, the organization said, demanding he resign, not make an apology.
					
					 Park Geun Hye should make an official apology before the people and ostracize Nam, it noted.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Slammed for Patronizing IS
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Slammed for Patronizing IS
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- An editorial titled "Nam Jae Jun's stay in office is little short of a declaration of election rigging backed by power" was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on April 16. 
					 The editorial recalled that the investigation results that the spy case of a public official in Seoul city was faked up by the Intelligence Service (IS) were made public but Park Geun Hye let Director of the IS Nam Jae Jun, the chief architect of the case, stay in office.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is patronizing the IS, claiming that intelligence organs' activities against the north and anti-communist investigation function should not be weakened because of the above-said case, it charged.
					
					 Querying why Park Geun Hye is taking so much pain to shield Nam, the editorial continued:
					
					 The IS was the general headquarters for operations to rig the last "presidential election" with the backing of power organs.
					
					 The spy case is the burlesque orchestrated by the IS to commit irregularities backed by power in the June 4 local elections again, far from reflecting on the case. Park's action to let Nam stay in office is little short of an open declaration that she will commit similar crimes in the forthcoming local elections.
					
					 If the IS is allowed to illegally interfere in the elections, the election results will as clear as a pikestaff. This is the lesson taught by the 2012 "presidential election".
					
					 Calling upon the people to rise up in actions for the ouster of Nam and democracy, the editorial said: That is why all people should take part in the all-people candlelight action on April 19.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation and compatriots at the DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka on April 14 to celebrate the significant Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos documenting the immortal revolutionary exploits the President performed by liberating the country and building Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books introducing the leadership feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and magazines and photo albums dealing with the reality of the motherland. 
					
					 A seminar on the revolutionary exploits of the President was held. 
					
					 The chairpersons of the Korean Autonomous Society for National Culture in Nakhodka and the Korean Autonomous Society for National Culture in Partizansk City and others made speeches there.
					
					 The speakers said that overseas Koreans were celebrating with splendor the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the founder and eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 They praised the President as a prominent leader and iron-willed brilliant commander who put an end to the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, liberated the country, built a socialist power and led the human cause of independence to victory.
					
					 The immortal revolutionary feats performed by the President are always remembered by the overseas Koreans and the world progressives, they noted.
					
					 National reunification is the historic task of the nation which should be accomplished by the concerted efforts of the Koreans free from foreign interference, they declared, calling on the overseas compatriots to united closer and work hard to implement the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Peru
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place in Lima, Peru on April 11 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meeting were delegates of the political parties and organizations of Peru including the preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, Communist Party (Red Motherland), People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students, Revolutionary Socialist Party, Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, and the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and other people.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Peru and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Tani Baler Lopera, chairman of the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, in his speech said that Kim Il Sung is the great leader who was born in a patriotic and revolutionary family and devoted his all to the struggle for the country, people and socialism till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Victor Oliva Miguel, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, highly praised Kim Il Sung as an invincible strategist who defeated U.S. imperialism which boasts of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, said that Kim Il Sung led the revolutionary wars for defeating the Japanese and U.S. imperialism and socialist construction to victory by dint of the unity of the revolutionary forces.
					
					 Guillermo Alcazar Ribera, chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and Teresa Otiniano, chairwoman of the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, said that the exploits performed by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk will be immortal.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Events were held in foreign countries on April 8 and 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Romania, Germany, DR Congo and Colombia.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing successes made by the DPRK's army and people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Film shown included Korean film "Eternal Treasure Praising the Sun".
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun said:
					
					 Events to celebrate the Day of the Sun are now under way worldwide.
					
					 This makes us keenly realize once again that Kim Il Sung is the great leader who is deeply revered by not only the Korean people but world progressive humankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany praised Kim Il Sung for defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation and founding the immortal Juche idea to provide the immortal guiding idea for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of DR Congo who doubles as chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association in a lecture stressed that the DPRK could invariably advance along the road of independence and socialism thanks to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who led the Korean revolution to victory under the unfurled banner of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Russian Organ on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Russian Organ on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country" was posted by the Khabarovski Express of Russia on its website on April 11.
					 The work, published on August 18, Juche 79 (1990), indicates the ways for achieving national reunification, etc.
					
					 Seen on the website was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed in Nation-Building Praised in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed in Nation-Building Praised in Germany
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A political party and an organization of Germany posted on their websites special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung on April 8 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The German Communist Party in its article titled "Kim Il Sung's exploits performed in the nation-building" said:
					
					 The DPRK is holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President.
					
					 The Korean people always remember Kim Il Sung who made great contributions to the cause of nation-building.
					
					 The DPRK's political, military and economic foundations grew stronger and the harmonious whole of the leader, the party and masses was formed under his leadership.
					
					 His exploits performed in the nation-building will shine forever along with the eternal prosperity of socialist Korea.
					
					 The MS Tourist Company of Germany posted the following article titled "Eternal sun":
					
					 The august name of Kim Il Sung means the sun.
					
					 The President clearly indicated the road to be followed by humankind just as his august name meant and looked after all people with warm love and great attraction.
					
					 Many people who had the honor of being received by the President deeply admired his noble personality and warm humanity. 
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and cause will last forever just as the sun always remains shining.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on April 9 and 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows in Pakistan, Iran and Austria.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched the Korean films including "Kimilsungia" and "Eternal Treasure Praising the Sun".
					
					 Present there were personages of political parties and organizations and people in the relevant countries.
					
					 Reporters and speakers including the secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, the general secretary of the Sind State Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party praised Kim Il Sung as a prominent leader and legendary hero who founded the immortal Juche idea, liberated the country and built the socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The president of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran said that the friendly and cooperative relations between Iran and the DPRK were provided by Kim Il Sung, adding that they would grow stronger in future, too.
					
					 The chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK stressed that Kim Il Sung was a benefactor of national resurrection as he defeated the Japanese imperialists and liberated the country.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Karachi and Lahore, Pakistan and Vienna, Austria.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries from March 30 to April 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included lectures in the Czech Republic, Mexico, Guinea and Nigeria.
					
					 The secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said that Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, liberated the country, led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory and built a powerful socialist state of independence, self-sufficiency and self-reliance in defence in Korea.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea in a lecture paid the noblest tribute to Kim Il Sung who made immortal contributions to accomplishing the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The dean of the art faculty of Guinean Art College lauded the noble popular traits of Kim Il Sung, adding his benevolent image will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but humankind.
					
					 The manager of an agro-stock farm of Nasarawa State, Nigeria praised Kim Il Sung for setting a brilliant example in building a revolutionary party in the era of independence.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Assailed by Ugandan Organization, Italian Figure
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon Assailed by Ugandan Organization, Italian Figure
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- An Ugandan organization and an Italian figure strongly protested against the Japanese authorities' crackdown on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 7 and 10.
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said in its statement:
					
					 We feel the extreme disgust at the fact that Japan styling itself a "law-governed state" recently made an illegal decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon.
					
					 The decision is an undisguised crackdown upon Chongryon which is an overseas citizens organization defending the legitimate rights of Koreans in Japan and has played the role of diplomatic mission of the DPRK.
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities and all institutions concerned to immediately cancel the decision which may do harm to the regional peace and take a measure to prevent the consequences to be entailed by it in the future.
					
					 Franco Costanzi, secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in his protest letter sent to the Japanese minister of Justice and foreign minister expressed the concern over the Tokyo District Court's illegal decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon and strongly demanded the Japanese authorities fully ensure the rights of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Crackdown upon Chongryon Condemned by Brazilian Political Party, Indian Organization
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Crackdown upon Chongryon Condemned by Brazilian Political Party, Indian Organization
Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian political party and an Indian organization issued statements on April 3 and 10 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Genuine Democratic Movement of Brazil said:
					
					 It is illegal for the Tokyo District Court to make a decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon under the manipulation of the Japanese authorities.
					
					 We vehemently condemn the court's fraud.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities want to save their face as a "law-governed state" even a bit and sincerely wish the improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations, they should stop at once their moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon though belatedly.
					
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said:
					
					 We strongly protest against the Tokyo District Court's decision on allowing the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon and denounce it as a crime.
					
					 The recent decision is attributable to the Japanese authorities' hostile moves to stamp out the center of activities of Chongryon representing the DPRK and thus weaken its authority and obliterate the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to stop at once their moves to seize the hall.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Choummaly Sayasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Choummaly Sayasone
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 11 Choummaly Sayasone, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Querido camarada,
					
					Informado de que en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, usted fue reelecto como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, le extiendo calidas felicitaciones y saludos en nombre del CC del PPRL, el Comite Central de Defensa y Seguridad y en el mio propio.
					
					Su reeleccion en el maximo cargo de la RPDC es una expresion de la absoluta confianza que le depositan el partido, el gobierno y todo el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Estoy convencido de que bajo su sabia direccion, el hermano pueblo coreano lograra mayores exitos en la lucha por alcanzar la meta presentada en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC y por construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Formulo sinceros votos por la buena salud y felicidad de usted y por los exitos en su noble causa.
					
					Deseo que se fortalezcan y se desarrollen sin parar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad que unen a los partidos, Estados y pueblos de los dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Zimbabwe
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Zimbabwe, Robert G. Mugabe, con motivo del 34o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais.
					En la misiva, el remitente expreso la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Zimbabwe se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran tambien en lo adelante.
					
					Formulo sinceros votos por mayores exitos en los trabajos del destinatario y del pueblo zimbabweyano para preservar la estabilidad del pais y lograr la unidad nacional y el desarrollo economico.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 17 un banquete en su sede diplomatica. 
					Fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Hyong Jun, y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					Estuvo presente el miembro de la sede diplomatica cubana. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el representante diplomatico dijo que ha celebrado significativamente junto con el pueblo coreano el 102o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente y agrego que la vida del lider coreano es el modelo para el pueblo coreano y los otros revolucionarios del mundo. 
					
					Continuo que tanto en el pasado como en el presente, el pueblo cubano quedara para siempre como amigo del pueblo coreano y expreso la conviccion de que los coreanos construiran cuanto antes un Estado prospero socialista y lograran sin falta la reintegracion territorial de la patria. 
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo que cada ano, los companeros cubanos celebran solemnemente junto con el pueblo coreano el Dia del Sol, lo cual es una expresion de infinita veneracion hacia el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Destaco que apreciar, consolidar y desarrollar la amistad combativa y los lazos de solidaridad con Cuba, en que estan impregnadas las proezas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, son la invariable posicion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					En el futuro tambien, al igual que en el pasado, el pueblo coreano estara siempre en la misma trinchera con el hermano pueblo cubano en la lucha comun por la independencia, el antiimperialismo y el socialismo, apunto.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela siniestro objetivo de la orientacion diplomatica de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela siniestro objetivo de la orientacion diplomatica de Japon
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Japon publico la "nota azul diplomatica" de 2014 que expuso la orientacion de sus actividades diplomaticas de este ano.
					En ese documento, Japon acuso el "problema de armas nucleares y de misiles" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que eso es el "mayor factor de peligro para la seguridad" de Japon y Asia oriental y crece mas que nunca la importancia de la alianza Japon-EE.UU.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual divulgado este viernes, senala que Japon repitio el "rumor de la amenaza proveniente del Norte de Corea" partiendo de su anejada hostilidad a la RPDC y de su intencion de alcanzar sus malsanos objetivos politicos.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses, colmados de la hostilidad a la RPDC, no quieren ver objetiva y serenamente la realidad e interpretan intencionalmente al reves los problemas, critico el comentarista y continuo:
					
					Ellos quieren cazar dos pajaros de un tiro utilizando esta carta politica: "rumor de la amenaza del Norte de Corea".
					
					En primer lugar, intentan salir del serio aislamiento diplomatico, causado por su politica de derechizacion militarista.
					
					Amplificando ese rumor, tratan de resaltar la necesidad del fortalecimiento de la alianza Japon-EE.UU. y mejorar asi las ahora embarazosas relaciones con EE.UU. y a la larga, esquivar la flecha de criticas internacionales dirigida a Japon.
					
					El otro proposito descansa en preparar las condiciones favorables a su ambicion militarista de expansion a ultramar.
					
					En su reciente encuentro con el secretario de Defensa norteamericano, el gobernador japones dijo abiertamente que su pais acelera el "ordenamiento de la base legal" para el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa colectiva en vista del "problema nuclear y de misiles" de la RPDC.
					
					Japon debe portarse bien si no quiere sufrir desgracias por meter su nariz en el problema de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica informe de revision de estrategia de defensa de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica informe de revision de estrategia de defensa de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos publico el informe de revision de la estrategia de defensa cuatrienal que persigue mantener y aumentar los 3 medios de golpe nuclear estrategico.
					En un comentario individual de este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun critico ese anuncio publico de EE.UU. en contra de su alegato por un "mundo sin armas nucleares", y continuo:
					
					Esa consigna no paso de ser una propaganda politica para enganar a otros paises y ganar la simpatia de la opinion publica mundial.
					
					Fingiendo estar interesado en la paz, quiso calmar el creciente clima antiyanqui y desarmar a los paises portadores de arma nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. es el que amenaza a otros paises con armas nucleares incumpliendo su promesa de no proliferacion nuclear.
					
					Los portaaviones y submarinos nucleares y los bombardeos estrategicos, que constituyen dos de los 3 medios de ataque nuclear estrategico, amenazan la paz y la seguridad en todas partes del Pacifico y el Atlantico.
					
					Otro medio, o sea, los misiles balisticos intercontinentales apuntan siempre los puntos estrategicos de sus rivales.
					
					Gracias a la transferencia de tecnologia nuclear de EE.UU., Israel pudo poseer mas de 200 armas nucleares.
					
					Los medios de ataque norteamericanos toman a la RPDC como el primer blanco.
					
					Se comprobara en la realidad el caracter justo del disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC que tiene el objetivo de prevenir el desastre nuclear de alcance global y lograr la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el mundo entero.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena demagogia anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena demagogia anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 18 de abril (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, se torna intolerable la propaganda tendenciosa de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este viernes un articulo individual que sigue:
					
					Insatisfecho de haber descrito como "amenaza" a la RPDC, EE.UU. la critica ahora como "pais del mal" y "lugar perverso" cuestionando hasta las elecciones de diputados al organo del poder.
					
					Ademas, trata de internacionalizar el "problema de derechos humanos" de Corea sometiendolo a la consideracion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Desesperados ante la superioridad y el poderio del regimen socialista al estilo coreano que no puede imitar ni haber en el capitalismo, los imperialistas norteamericanos recrudecen la demagogia para mantener a toda costa el tambaleante sistema de cooperacion internacional contra la RPDC.
					
					La humanidad busca hoy en la realidad de Corea el camino a seguir.
					
					La paz de la Peninsula Coreana se garantiza por el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de Corea.  
					
					La actual batalla de defensa del socialismo es la lucha por superar al imperialismo en todas las ramas de la vida social al poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad y el poderio del socialismo consolidando las victorias y los exitos ya logrados.
					
					EE.UU. no podra obtener nada con su sucia y brutal demagogia anti-RPDC.
